options: A simple product with no variations
A product like a T-shirt with many different sizes and colors
answer: A product like a T-shirt with many different sizes and colors

Which of the following is not a step for PCI Compliance?
options: Keep all credit card information out of your database
Use and regularly update anti-virus software
answer: Keep all credit card information out of your database

options: A special page designed to market a sale or product
A page with a list of products
answer: A special page designed to market a sale or product

What does the priority parameter in the WordPress add_ACTION FUNCTION DO?
options: Sets the memory limit for the function
Determines the order that callback functions run at when a hook occurs
Specifies the security level of the function
Limits the number of times a function can run
answer: Determines the order that callback functions run at when a hook occurs

text: When is the “init” hook fired in a WordPress plugin?
options: When the WordPress site has just finished loading
During the installation of a plugin
answer: When the WordPress site has just finished loading

answer: Process, formats and can display the content from the database
